text: Black Panther star Chadwick Boseman took over the Red Carpet at the 2018 Oscars. Instead of a conventional tux, he wore a black coat with silver embellishments that felt like a sneaky tribute to his character T'Challa. While talking to Michael Strahan on ABC he shouted ` ` Wakanda forever'' into the crowd. He is scheduled to appear during the awards show as a presenter. ADVERTISEMENT
